author: Simple History
description:
This video was made possible thanks to everyone on the Simple History Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/simplehistory

Explore the life of a young recruit inside the world’s largest standing army as we follow Zhang Wei through training, ideology, new weapons, and daily routines in the People’s Liberation Army. From strict discipline to cutting-edge tanks and rapid-fire mealtimes, this video reveals what it’s really like to serve in China’s modern military.

Check out our other Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPdc6bs3I8s6Y4QE_3g3MZw
Discord server: https://discord.gg/JZsPQXHeYC
Become a Simple History member: https://www.youtube.com/simplehistory/join

title: A Day In The Life Of A Chinese PLA Soldier
